column2: "Nna afei Josef hyɛ noho do a ɔnnyɛ yie
column3: wɔ hɔn a wogyinagyina ne nkyɛn no nyinara hɔn enyim; na ɔkaa mu dɛ
column4: Wɔmma nkorɔfo nyinara mfi me nkyɛn mfi. Na aber a Josef riyi noho edzi akyerɛ no nuanom no

column2: "Na ɔmaa ne ndze do sui: na Egyptfo no tsee
column3: na Farao fiefo tsee."

column2: "Na Josef see no nuanom no dɛ
column3: Emi nye Josef; ana m’egya da ho tse ase? Na no nuanom no enntum emmbua no; osiandɛ hɔn ho popoe wɔ n’enyim."

column2: "Na Josef see no nuanom no dɛ
column3: Meserɛ hom
column4: wompin me nkyɛn. Na wopinii. Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Emi nye hom nua Josef a hom tɔɔn no baa Egypt no."

column2: "Na afei mma ɔnnyɛ hom yaw
column3: na mma hom bo mmfufuw hom ho so
column4: dɛ hom tɔɔn me baa ha: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn na ɔsomaa me ma midzii hom enyim kan

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔkɔm esi asaase yi do mfe ebien nye yi: na mfe enum so aka a adɔw nye buber so nnyi mu."
"Na Nyankopɔn somaa me ma midzii hom enyim kan ama maabɔkora edzinkaa bi ama hom wɔ asaase do
column3: na medze ɔgye kɛsenara agye hom nkwa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: nnyɛ hom bi na wɔsomaa me wɔ ha
column4: na Nyankopɔn a: na ɔayɛ me Farao n’egya
column5: na ne fi nyinara wura na Egypt asaase nyinara do panyin."

column2: "Hom nka hom ho nkɔ m’egya hɔ
column3: na wɔnkɛse no dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ wo ba Josef se nye yi
column5: Nyankopɔn ayɛ me Egypt nyinara wura: bra me nkyɛn

column2: "Na bɛtsena Gosen asaase do
column3: na bɛn me

column2: "na mobɔhwɛ wo wɔ hɔ; na aka ɔkɔm mfe enum so; bɛyɛ na ehia
column3: ɔwo

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: hom enyiwa tua
column4: na mo nua Benjamin so n’enyiwa tua
column5: dɛ m’ano na ɔrekasa kyerɛ hom yi."

column2: "Na hom nkɛka m’enyimnyam a mowɔ no wɔ Egypt nyinara no ho asɛm nkyerɛ m’egya
column3: na dza hom ehu no nyinara; na hom nyɛ ntsɛm nkɛfa m’egya mbra ha."

column2: "Na ɔbaar no nua Benjamin no kɔn
column3: na osui; na Benjamin so sui wɔ no kɔn ho."

column2: "Na ɔfefeew no nuanom nyinara hɔn ano
column3: na ɔdzedze hɔn mu sui: na n’ekyir no no nuanom no nye no kasae."

column2: "Na wɔtsee nka wɔ Farao fie dɛ
column3: Josef no nuanom aba: na Farao nye no nkowaa enyi gyee papa."

column2: "Na Farao see Josef dɛ
column3: Se wo nuanom no dɛ
column4: Iyi na hom nyɛ: hom mfa ndzɛmba nsoasoa hom mbowa no
column6: hom nsan nkɔ Keenan asaase do;"

column2: "na hom nkɛfa hom egya nye hom fifo
column3: na hom mbra me nkyɛn: na mebɛma hom Egypt asaase no mu dza oye
column4: na hom bedzi asaase no do ndzepa."

column2: "Afei se hɔn dɛ
column3: iyi na hom nyɛ; hom mfa ntseaseanam wɔ Egypt asaase do nkɛfa hom mbofraba
column4: nye hom yernom na hom egya ma wɔmbra."

column2: "Eso mma hom mma hom ndzɛmba ho nnhia hom; na dza oye wɔ Egypt asaase do nyinara yɛ homdze."
"Na Israel ne mba no yɛɛ dɛm: na Josef maa hɔn ntseaseanam
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Farao hyɛe no ara
column4: na ɔmaa hɔn kwan mu edziban."

column2: "Ɔmaa hɔn nyinara ntar nsakyerho nkorkor; na Benjamin dze
column3: ɔmaa no ndwetɛbona ahaasa

column2: "Na dza ɔdze kɛmaa n’egya nye yi; nsoasopɔnkɔ du a wɔsoso Egypt ndzɛmba pa
column3: nye nsoasopɔnkɔber du a wɔsoso eburow
column5: nye edzidzidze a n’egya bedzi no wɔ kwan mu."

column2: "Nna ogyaa no nuanom no kwan
column3: na wosii mu na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom nhwɛ mma hom aannka yaw wɔ kwan mu."

column2: "Na wofii Egypt kɔree
column3: na wɔbaa hɔn egya Jakob nkyɛn wɔ Keenan asaase do."

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Josef da ho tse ase
column4: na ɔno nye Egypt asaase nyinara do panyin. Na bobor boor no

column2: "Na wɔkaa Josef ne nsɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn no nyinara kyerɛɛ no: na aber a ohun ntseaseanam a Josef maa wɔdze kɔree dɛ wɔmfa nkɛfa no no
column3: nna hɔn egya Jakob n’akoma tɔɔ ne yamu:"

column2: "na Israel see dɛ
column3: ɔdɔɔ so ma me; me ba Josef da ho tse ase: mobɔkɔ mekohu no ana mewu."
